item.title: Transport v1.4.5.22
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.4.5.22
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 03 Jun 2021 21:26:55 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.4.5]
- Hotfix for latest lockin version
- updated dependencies
- includes some changes from MNK
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Razorbill RP100 v21.0.1.3
item.description:
Product: Razorbill RP100 v21.0.1.3
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 21 May 2021 13:19:40 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Divers for Razorbill RP100 HV amplifier

Release Notes: [21.0.1]
- Issue #4: Dialog when closing
- Issue #8: Update Icon
- Issue #9: Change Launcher startup behavior
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Razorbill RP100 v21.0.0.2
item.description:
Product: Razorbill RP100 v21.0.0.2
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 21 May 2021 10:49:40 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Divers for Razorbill RP100 HV amplifier

Release Notes: [21.0.0.1]
- adds SMO-based monitor and control process
- logs each channel's output state, level, slew, voltage, and current to the PGSQL database
APIs:
- Set Strain automatically sets V1 = -V2
- Set Level sets the level of a single, selectable output channel
- Get Strain returns the level for channel 1
- Get Level returns the level from the selected single channel
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: LEIDEN TC v21.5.14.22
item.description:
Product: LEIDEN TC v21.5.14.22
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 14 May 2021 15:20:13 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Tools used by LevyLab to interact with Leiden MNK Temperature Control (TC)

[Instrument.MNK_TC.lvclass]
- API that overrides "Get Temperature.vi" method of Instrument.Cryostat.lvclass

Release Notes: [21.5.14]
- change name to instrument.TC.xx
- add TC.CF
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: PostgreSQL Library v0.3.4.22
item.description:
Product: PostgreSQL Library v0.3.4.22
Company: JDP Science
Release Date: Mon, 03 May 2021 13:12:57 -0400
Packager: JDP Science

Description: Wrapping of libPQ for PostgreSQL access. Higher-level than libPQ itself. See Examples.

Follow this tutorial to install LibPQ on an NI Linux RT target :
https://forums.ni.com/t5/NI-Linux-Real-Time-Documents/Tutorial-PostgreSQL-with-LabVIEW/tac-p/4111331

Release Notes: 0.3.4:
- fix issues with PGPASS credentials UI
- look for "(" ")" in COPY column list

0.3.3:
- back save to LabVIEW 2016
- add support for pgpass credentials files (Issue #4)
- add support for COPY (issue #5)

Thanks to contributor Patrick Irvin (@ciozi137).

New in 0.2.2 :
- switch to LabVIEW 2017
- resolved issue #1 : add support for NI Linux RT Targets
- resolved issue #2 : add support for boolean parameter when executing single command with parameters
- resolved issue #3 : improved parameter detection

Thanks to contributor Antoine Chalons (@antoinechalons) for their work on this release.
item.dc:creator: JDP Science
